name: Crafting Magic Items
guidance: Use the Player's Handbook for Potions of Healing and Spell Scrolls; use these rules for other items.
Crafting rules use 'you' to refer to the character crafting the item.
Crafting time and cost depend on rarity (see the Magic Item Crafting Time and Cost table).
You must work 8 hours per day; days need not be consecutive.
Assistants can reduce time; divide time by the number of crafters (normally one assistant).
Materials cost represents raw materials; availability is 75% in cities and 25% elsewhere, and you can check again after 7 days if unavailable.
